Description:
Identifies when an organization doesn't have the proper license for PIM and is out of compliance.

Author: Mark Morowczynski '@markmorow', Gloria Lee, '@gleeiamglo'
Sigma Repository: [GitHub](https://github.com/SigmaHQ/sigma)
Name: Invalid PIM License
Query: sourcetype='azure-pim' eql select * from _source_ where riskeventtype = 'invalidlicensealertincident'
